pr_title: [mqtt.homie] Create PercentageValue only if attribute is settable

timeline.message:
Create PercentageValue only if attribute is settable

Signed-off-by: Aitor Iturrioz <riturrioz@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: You got rid of the attributes.unit null check. Please add it back in. Or is it not needed?
timeline.author: cpmeister

replies.bodyText: Hi @cpmeister! The null check is not needed, because unit is initialized as an empty string 😉
replies.author: bodiroga
